eyb:ForceStance.NAME: Force Stance
DESCRIPTION: [F] gains are doubled. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [F]

eyb:AgilityStance.NAME: Agility Stance
DESCRIPTION: [A] gains are doubled. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [A]

eyb:WillpowerStance.NAME: Willpower Stance

eyb:BlessingStance.NAME: Blessing Stance
DESCRIPTION: [B] gains are doubled. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [B]

eyb:CorruptionStance.NAME: Corruption Stance
DESCRIPTION: [C] gains are doubled. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [C]

eyb:TechnicStance.NAME: Technic Stance
DESCRIPTION: [T] gains are doubled. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [T]
